description: A possible state of the Container. Only one of its members may be specified. If none of them is specified, the default one is `"waiting"`.

terminated.description: Details about a terminated Container. When updating, if the Pod's `reatartPolicy` is not `"Always"` and the container has terminated, the server checks if the container's exit code is non zero. If the the Pod's `restartPolciy` is `"OnFailure"` and the container's exit code is non zero, updating the container to a non-terminated state is allowed, or else the server rejects the update request.
